conbody.p: Running .\tmserver.bat or ./tmserver.sh without parameters displays help for starting TMEngine as a standalone server.
conbody.codeblock:
Usage:
tmserver.sh [-help] [-version] [-port portNumber]
Where:
-help: (optional) Display this help information and exit -version: (optional) Display version & build information and exit -port: (optional) Port for running HTTP server. Default is 8000
conbody.p: You can verify that the server is running by visiting its default web page: http://localhost:8000/TMServer/ (adjust port number if you change it).
